additional_item_ids.description: `additional_item_ids` will only be included in the response if `additional_items` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

balance_in_cents.description: The balance, in cents, of the invoice.

created_at.description: The date the invoice was recorded in Mavenlink, in YY-MM-DD[T]HH:MM:SS-TIMEZONE format.

currency.description: The currency being used for the invoice.

currency_base_unit.description: The number of the units in the `balance_in_cents` attribute that are required to make up a single unit of the `currency`.

currency_symbol.description: The symbol that represents the currency being used for the invoice.

draft.description: Whether or not the invoice is a draft.

due_date.description: The date the invoice is due, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

expense_ids.description: `expense_ids` will only be included in the response if `expenses` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

external_reference_ids.description: `external_reference_ids` will only be included in the response if `external_references` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

fixed_fee_item_ids.description: `fixed_fee_item_ids` will only be included in the response if `fixed_fee_items` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

invoice_date.description: The date the invoice was incurred, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

message.description: Any notes added to the invoice.

payment_schedule.description: The number of days within which the total amount of the invoice is expected to be paid. For example, use `30` for a Net 30 payment schedule. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Net_D.

recipient_id.description: `recipient_id` will only be included in the response if `recipient` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

status.description: The current status of the invoice ('new', 'cancelled', 'accepted payment').

tax_rate.description: The tax rate percentage that is applied to the invoice total.

time_entry_ids.description: `time_entry_ids` will only be included in the response if `time_entries` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

updated_at.description: The date the invoice was last updated, in YY-MM-DD[T]HH:MM:SS-TIMEZONE format.

user_id.description: `user_id` will only be included in the response if `user` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

workspace_ids.description: `workspace_ids` will only be included in the response if `workspaces` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.
